question: Can you please explain how to read this dua (Qunoot-e-Naazila)
answer:
QUESTION
The one you read when there is a lot of muslims suffering in the world in salaah (ie. fajr) before going into ruku in the second rakaat do you put your hands up like in normal dua?
ANSWER


Share:
In Qunoot-e-Naazila, the Imaam as well as the followers should keep their
hands by their sides and say aameen softly.

And Allah Ta`ala Knows Best.

Was salaam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
